startDate.description: Date and time when the reindex job was started

endDate.description: Date and time when the reindex job finished

startedBy.description: ID of the user who started the reindex job

reindexType.description: Type of reindex: full or incremental

linesRead.description: Total number of resources read during reindexing

linesSent.description: Total number of resources sent to index during reindexing

status.description: Current status of the reindex job (e.g. STARTED, COMPLETED, FAILED)
